name: Nachiket More
summary: Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience designing and developing scalable web applications and APIs using modern technologies including React, Django, Node.js, and AWS. Skilled in both frontend and backend development, cloud deployment, and CI/CD automation. Passionate about building efficient, maintainable software solutions and collaborative problem solving.

publications.title: Comparative Study Of Flight Delay Prediction Using Back Propagation And Radial Basis Function
publications.publisher: International Research Journal of Engineering and Technology (IRJET)

info: Developed React frontend with RESTful APIs using Spring Boot to manage personal expenses with CRUD operations and summary reports.
Integrated Spring Data JPA with H2 database, achieving 100% test coverage on core endpoints.
Created endpoints for total, monthly, and category-wise summaries; optimized queries to reduce DB load by 30%.

projects.project_title: Web App for Quick and Easy Recipes
info: Developed a full-stack web app using React (frontend) and Django (backend) and DynamoDB for recipe storage.
Engineered Django REST APIs integrated with AWS DynamoDB, handling 500+ recipe records.
Deployed backend on Elastic Beanstalk and frontend on AWS S3 via CI/CD pipelines using AWS CodePipeline.
Set up CORS and secure cross-origin communication, reducing release time by 40%.
Built RESTful CRUD APIs using Rust and Axum framework connected to PostgreSQL DB.
Implemented robust route handling and error responses; supported operations for 1000+ records.
Designed for high performance and type safety with minimal runtime overhead.
Created a Python web app for movie sentiment analysis using TMDB API and Google NLP API.
Processed over 1,000 reviews/day; deployed to Google Cloud Run with Docker for autoscaling.
Showcased detailed review analysis with intuitive frontend interface.

projects.project_title: AeroGraph - Full Stack Flight Data Visualization Application
info: React and Node.js based front-end app to visualize flight data with MongoDB backend.
Used react-google-charts and react-simple-maps libraries for data representation.
Built a microservices architecture with secure Auth0 login and backend services using FastAPI.
Used Docker Compose for modular deployment and MongoDB for data storage, reducing cold-starts by 50%.
